name: Payment transfer request for invalid amount and amount greater than or equal to 1,000,000 euro is rejected

testSteps.description: Payment transfer request for invalid amount and amount greater than or equal to 1,000,000 euro is rejected #1: {amount=0.00, response code=400, response message=Invalid amount}

children.description: Given a payment request of invalid <"amount"> is received via messaging services
When the payment details are inserted in the database
Then error 400 and <"response message"> is created
And the payment status is updated to invalid in the database

userStory.storyName: Payment transfer request rejection for the amount which is missing transaction input criteria.

featureTag.name: Featurefiles/Payment transfer request rejection for the amount which is missing transaction input criteria.

title: Payment transfer request for invalid amount and amount greater than or equal to 1,000,000 euro is rejected

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given a payment request of invalid <"amount"> is received via messaging services
When the payment details are inserted in the database
Then error <response code> and <"response message"> is created
And the payment status is updated to invalid in the database
